about_the_game:
28 traits, tons of shapes

Press space for a triangle, one of many variety.

That shape might be
  • Bouncy
  • Spinning
  • Racist
  • Protesting gravity
  • Sick
  • Or one of many others...

Your task is to gather them all, make sense of it, and merge your geometric friends and foes to a square. Then, a pentagon, a septagon, a hexagon...

Many others, then... you're dodecadone.


Features

  • Full modding support- anything from new traits to entirely new games!
  • 9 Unique themes, including full transparency
  • Custom themes with CSS
  • Cheats menu
  • Scoring system & speedrunning timer
  • Practically every language ever via automatic translation
  • Silly english for the goofsters
  • 100% free, only with donations. Open-source under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

Press space for a triangle, one of many variety.

Your task is to gather them all, make sense of it, and merge your geometric friends and foes to a square. Then, a pentagon, a septagon, a hexagon...

Many others, then... you're dodecadone.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: 3 GHz 64-Bit Dual Core – Intel/AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: 4 GHz Dual Core – Intel/AMD processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

name: Dodecadone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz 64-Bit Dual Core – Intel/AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: A physics & logic puzzler about merging shapes and traits, similar to Suika games. A triangle might be bouncy, your septagon sick & coughing, or an ennenagon defying the laws of physics.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
